reasons_to_visit.details: September offers ideal temperatures with comfortable days and cool evenings.
Early fall foliage starts appearing in parks and along the Vltava River.
Wine harvest season begins with special events and tastings at local establishments.
Tourist numbers decrease significantly while weather remains excellent.
September marks the return of serious cultural programming after summer break.

reasons_to_avoid.details: Daylight hours begin decreasing, affecting late evening activity timing.
September can bring more frequent rain showers requiring weather preparation.
